message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this great product and I think you'd really enjoy it. My asking price is $110. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $90 for it. Looking forward to your response!
Hey Bob, I understand your offer, but I'm still hoping to get a bit closer to my asking price. Would you consider $95? It's a great deal, and we can close this quickly!
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I am still not able to meet at $95, but I am willing to pay $90. Let me know if this works for you!
